docTitle.titlePart:
Microwave Dielectric Spectroscopy Workshop "Measure the
Difference"

Microwave Dielectric
Spectroscopy Workshop "Measure the Difference"
Agilent Technologies
& Innovative Measurement Solutions

front.div:
In the mid 1980s, Agilent Technologies developed several products that
measure the electromagnetic properties of material samples. At that time
Agilent Technologies was a part of the Hewlett Packard Company. These
products were developed to meet the needs our customers involved in the
development of electronic components, circuits and systems. These
products were also used by Department of Defense contractors involved in
the design and development of stealth vehicles. Since there introductions
these products have found many other applications. The aim of this
presentation is to give a survey of these and other potential applications .
